description:
As a developer
  I want to use logging functionality in my application
  So that I can track application behavior and debug issues

elements.name: Log application startup

steps.name: the application is running
the application starts
the application should log startup information
the log level should be appropriate for startup

elements.name: Log user authentication

steps.name: the application is running
a user attempts to log in
the authentication is successful
the application should log the successful authentication
the log should include user information

elements.name: Log error conditions

steps.name: the application is running
an error occurs in the application
the application should log the error
the log should include error details
the log level should indicate an error

elements.name: Log performance warnings

steps.name: the application is running
system performance degrades
the application should log performance warnings
the log should include performance metrics

name: Application logging behavior

description:
As a developer
  I want a webhook endpoint that receives POST requests from Commercetools subscription API
  So that I can process customer.created and customer.updated events

elements.name: Accept valid customer.created event

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload
I send a POST request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the endpoint should identify the event as customer.created

elements.name: Accept valid customer.updated event

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools customer.updated webhook payload
I send a POST request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the endpoint should identify the event as customer.updated

elements.name: Reject non-POST requests

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools webhook payload
I send a GET request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject invalid request methods

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools webhook payload
I send a GET request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject invalid request methods

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools webhook payload
I send a PUT request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject invalid request methods

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools webhook payload
I send a DELETE request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject invalid request methods

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a valid Commercetools webhook payload
I send a PATCH request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject request with missing body

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
no request body is provided
I send a POST request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject request with invalid JSON

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
an invalid JSON payload
I send a POST request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

elements.name: Reject request with malformed payload structure

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
a JSON payload with missing required fields
I send a POST request to the webhook endpoint
the endpoint should return HTTP status 400

name: Webhook Endpoint for Commercetools Events

description:
As a developer
  I want to transform Commercetools customer data into Segment Identify API format
  So that I can send properly formatted data to Segment

elements.name: Transform customer with email to Segment format

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with email "user@example.com"
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have userId "user@example.com"
the transformed data should have email "user@example.com" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with first name and last name

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with first name "John" and last name "Doe"
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "John Doe" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with full name

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with full name "Jane Smith"
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "Jane Smith" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with complete address

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with address:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have address in traits:

elements.name: Transform customer with all fields (email, name, address)

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have userId "user@example.com"
the transformed data should have email "user@example.com" in traits
the transformed data should have name "John Doe" in traits
the transformed data should have address in traits:

elements.name: Handle missing email field gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload without email
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have email in traits

elements.name: Handle missing name fields gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload without name fields
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have name in traits

elements.name: Handle missing address fields gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload without address fields
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have address in traits

elements.name: Handle null email field gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with null email
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have email in traits

elements.name: Handle null name fields gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with null name fields
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have name in traits

elements.name: Handle null address fields gracefully

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with null address fields
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformation should complete without error
the transformed data should not have address in traits

elements.name: Handle partial address fields

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with partial address:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have address in traits:
the transformed data address should not have postalCode
the transformed data address should not have country

elements.name: Transform returns Segment Identify API compatible structure

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with email "test@example.com"
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have structure compatible with Segment Identify API
the transformed data should have userId field
the transformed data should have traits field
the transformed data traits should have email field

elements.name: Transform customer with different name combinations

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "John Doe" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with different name combinations

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "Jane" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with different name combinations

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "Smith" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with different name combinations

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "John Doe" in traits

elements.name: Transform customer with different name combinations

steps.name: a transformation function is available
a Commercetools customer payload with:
I transform the customer data to Segment format
the transformed data should have name "Jane Smith" in traits

name: Customer Data Transformation

description:
As a developer
  I want to send transformed customer data to Segment Identify API
  So that users are created or updated in Segment identified by email

elements.name: Send customer data to Segment Identify API successfully

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "user@example.com"

elements.name: Send customer data with email as userId

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "test@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "test@example.com" as userId

elements.name: Send customer data with email trait

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should include email "user@example.com" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with name trait

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with:
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should include name "John Doe" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with address trait

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with:
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should include address in traits:

elements.name: Send customer data with all traits (email, name, address)

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with:
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the API call should use email "user@example.com" as userId
the API call should include email "user@example.com" in traits
the API call should include name "Jane Smith" in traits
the API call should include address in traits:

elements.name: Handle successful API response

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the function should return success status
no error should be thrown

elements.name: Handle API error gracefully

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
the Segment API will return an error
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the function should return error status
the error should be handled gracefully

elements.name: Send customer.created event data to Segment

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data from customer.created event with email "newuser@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "newuser@example.com"

elements.name: Send customer.updated event data to Segment

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data from customer.updated event with email "existing@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "existing@example.com"

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "user@example.com" as userId
the API call should include email "user@example.com" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "test.user@domain.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "test.user@domain.com" as userId
the API call should include email "test.user@domain.com" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the function should return success status
no error should be thrown

elements.name: Handle API error gracefully

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
the Segment API will return an error
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the function should return error status
the error should be handled gracefully

elements.name: Send customer.created event data to Segment

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data from customer.created event with email "newuser@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "newuser@example.com"

elements.name: Send customer.updated event data to Segment

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data from customer.updated event with email "existing@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should succeed
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "existing@example.com"

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "user@example.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "user@example.com" as userId
the API call should include email "user@example.com" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "test.user@domain.com"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "test.user@domain.com" as userId
the API call should include email "test.user@domain.com" in traits

elements.name: Send customer data with different email addresses

steps.name: the Segment client is initialized with write key from environment
transformed customer data is available
transformed customer data with email "admin@company.org"
I send the customer data to Segment Identify API
the API call should use email "admin@company.org" as userId
the API call should include email "admin@company.org" in traits

description:
As a developer
  I want to test the complete flow from Commercetools webhook to Segment user creation/update
  So that I can verify the integration works correctly end-to-end

elements.name: Complete flow for customer.created event creates user in Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "newuser@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "newuser@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "John Doe" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: Complete flow for customer.updated event updates user in Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.updated webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be updated in Segment with userId "existing@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "existing@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "Jane Smith" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: User is identified by email in Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with email "user@example.com"
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be identified in Segment with userId "user@example.com"
the userId in Segment should match the email "user@example.com"

elements.name: All three fields (email, name, address) are correctly synced to Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer in Segment should have email "complete@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "Alice Johnson" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: Complete flow processes customer.created event end-to-end

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with email "test@example.com"
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the response should indicate success
the customer should appear in Segment
the customer should be identified by email "test@example.com"

elements.name: Complete flow processes customer.updated event end-to-end

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.updated webhook payload with email "update@example.com"
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the response should indicate success
the customer should appear in Segment
the customer should be identified by email "update@example.com"

elements.name: Data flows correctly from webhook through transformation to Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer data should be transformed correctly
the transformed data should be sent to Segment
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "flow@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have name "Bob Williams" in traits

elements.name: Complete flow works with different customer data combinations

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "user1@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "user1@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "John Doe" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: Complete flow works with different customer data combinations

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "user2@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "user2@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "Jane Smith" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: Complete flow works with different customer data combinations

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "user3@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "user3@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "Bob Jones" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:

elements.name: Integration can be tested locally

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
the application is running locally
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with email "local@example.com"
I send the webhook payload to the local webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "local@example.com"

elements.name: Integration can be tested on Vercel

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
the application is deployed on Vercel
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with email "vercel@example.com"
I send the webhook payload to the Vercel webhook endpoint
the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "vercel@example.com"

name: End-to-End Integration Testing
